subhead: The resignation of Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu ushers in a new period of political instability, though the Constitution, the law and republican tradition provide for the country to continue to function.

title: Netanyahu, in October 7 anniversary message, vows to return all Gaza hostages
subhead: 'We will continue to act to achieve all the war's objectives: the return of all abductees, the elimination of Hamas's rule, and ensuring that Gaza will never again pose a threat to Israel,' Netanyahu said in a statement issued by his office.

title: Israeli kibbutzim ravaged by October 7 attacks rebuild while honoring the past
subhead: Be'eri, Kfar Aza and Nir Oz were the communities hit the hardest by the attack carried out by Hamas two years ago. Since then, each has tried to reinvent itself, in its own way and at its own pace.

title: Trump's ineffective campaign to secure the Nobel Peace Prize
subhead: The American president's aggressive tactics have taken Norwegian experts by surprise. Yet in Oslo, the committee responsible for awarding the prize remains unfazed by attempts at influence, according to its secretary.

title: The double life of Jared Kushner, mixing business with politics as emissary for his father-in-law Donald Trump
subhead: Ivanka Trump's husband has a career as an unofficial diplomat and a master dealmaker, juggling billions and focusing his activities on the Middle East and Near East. His latest big coup, carried out with the Saudi sovereign wealth fund, was the $55 billion acquisition of video game giant Electronic Arts.

subhead: The close ties between former British prime minister Tony Blair and Benjamin Netanyahu have made him a key player in Donald Trump's plan for Gaza, writes historian Jean-Pierre Filiu in his column.

title: Morocco's prime minister faces challenge from the streets
subhead: Aziz Akhannouch finds himself under pressure, as part of the country's youth calls on King Mohammed VI to remove him from office. The king is expected to address Parliament on Friday.

title: Why foreigners love France but struggle with the French
subhead: While France captivates with its culture and lifestyle, the French, frequently caricatured as arrogant and impolite, often have a poor reputation. This ambivalence raises questions about the roots of anti-French sentiment abroad.
